com.example.projectbored

Class EventManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.projectbored.EventManager

  • public class EventManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles getting a random event, filtering events and other things related to the functionality of the idea button, and the options menu.
    Since:
    2020-04-07

      • fillEventsListWithSampleData

        public void fillEventsListWithSampleData()
        Fills the eventsList with sample data (temporary function until database gets setup)

      • getRandomElementOfEventsListByParameters

        public EventClass getRandomElementOfEventsListByParameters()
        Gets a random event from the list of events. If any filters are set (price, location, isGroup) then it chooses accordingly
        Returns:
        EventClass The random event that didn't get filtered out

      • FilterLocation

        public void FilterLocation(java.util.List<EventClass> randomEventPool)
        Filters the given list of events according to what was set in the options menu relating to the location
        Parameters:
        randomEventPool - This list of events will be filtered

      • FilterPrice

        public void FilterPrice(java.util.List<EventClass> randomEventPool)
        Filters the given list of events according to what was set in the options menu relating to the price
        Parameters:
        randomEventPool - This list of events will be filtered

      • StringToLocation

        public Location StringToLocation(java.lang.String selected)
        Converts a string to a location
        Parameters:
        selected - This is the string that was chosen from the spinner
        Returns:
        Location returns the valueOf conversion of the string, except in the case of "Anywhere", when it returns Location.Any

      • StringToPrice

        public Price StringToPrice(java.lang.String selected)
        Converts a string to a Price
        Parameters:
        selected - This is the string that was chosen from the spinner
        Returns:
        Price returns the valueOf conversion of the string, except in the case of "Any price", when it returns Price.Any
